channel.title: Manhattan waterfront – Steven Chu – Photographer & Visual Experience Designer New York
channel.description: The culture of New York, shaped through photography, iconic brand development, and community building in nightlife.

item.title: Archer by the Waterfront
item.dc:creator: Steven Chu
item.description: 00:57, Digital video recording. On one of the few early warm days of April, I met a […]
item.content:encoded:
00:57, Digital video recording.

On one of the few early warm days of April, I met a friend down by the waterfront to watch the sun set. She touches up her makeup and I watch the reflection in her compact mirror.
